resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/76951</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>76951</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40b2660c-fc00-43f0-2efc-8b734b3ba4ed#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Krisztus a trónuson, 5. század, Santa Pudenziana apszisa, Róma, mozaik.</string>
            <string language="en">Christ on the throne, 5th century, Apse of Santa Puedziana, Rome, mosaic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Christ auf dem Thron, 5. Jahrhundert, 
Apse von Sankt Puedziana, Rom, Mosaik</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Christ sur le trône, 5ème siècle, Apse de 
Santa Puedziana, Rome, mosaïque</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Christ no throne, ö século, Apse de Santa 
Puedziana, Roma, mosaic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Christ sul throne, quinto secolo, Apse di Santa 
Puedziana, Roma, mosaico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χριστός στο θρόνο, 5$ος αιώνας, apse Santa 
Puedziana, Ρώμη, μωσαϊκό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cristo en el trono, 5to siglo, Apse de Santa 
Puedziana, Roma, mosaico</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Szakállas Krisztus jelenik meg, felette a viharos égbolt, az evangélisták szimbolikus ábrázolásával, Krisztus keresztjével.</string>
            <string language="en">Appering bearded Chirst, above him the stormy sky with the symbolic illustration of the evangelsits, with Christ's cross</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">szíriai szakállas Krisztus,  evangélisták,  szimbolikus ábrázolás (ökör,  oroszlán,  sas,  angyal),  Santa Pudenziana,  5. század,  </string>
            <string language="en">syrian bearded Christ, evangelists, symbolis illustration (ox, lion, eagle, angel), Santa Pudenziana, 5th century</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Appering bärtiges Chirst, über ihm der 
stürmische Himmel mit der symbolischen Abbildung der evangelsits, mit
Kreuz Christs</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Appering Chirst barbu, au-dessus de lui le ciel 
orageux avec l'illustration symbolique des evangelsits, avec la croix 
du Christ</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Appering Chirst bearded, acima dele o céu stormy
com a ilustração simbólica dos evangelsits, com cruz de Christ</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Appering Chirst barbuto, sopra lui il cielo 
stormy con l'illustrazione simbolica dei evangelsits, con la traversa 
del Christ</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Appering γενειοφόρο Chirst, επάνω από τον ο 
θυελλώδης ουρανός με τη συμβολική απεικόνιση των evangelsits, 
με το σταυρό Χριστού</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Appering Chirst barbudo, sobre él el cielo 
tempestuoso con la ilustración simbólica de los evangelsits, con la 
cruz de Cristo</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">syrischer bärtiger Christ, Evangelisten, symbolis 
Abbildung (Rind, Löwe, Adler, Engel), Sankt Pudenziana, 5. 
Jahrhundert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">le Christ barbu syrien, évangélistes, illustration de 
symbolis (boeuf, lion, aigle, ange), Santa Pudenziana, 5ème siècle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Christ bearded syrian, evangelists, ilustração dos 
symbolis (boi, leão, águia, angel), Santa Pudenziana, ö século</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Christ barbuto siriano, evangelists, illustrazione di 
symbolis (bue, leone, aquila, angelo), Santa Pudenziana, quinto 
secolo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συριακός γενειοφόρος Χριστός, evangelists, απεικόνιση 
symbolis (βόδι, λιοντάρι, αετός, άγγελος), Santa 
Pudenziana, 5$ος αιώνας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cristo barbudo sirio, evangelistas, ilustración de los 
symbolis (buey, león, águila, ángel), Santa Pudenziana, 5to siglo</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:
org:Kossuth Kiadó Rt.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
